notes: ✨ This is for AgentTask (entity), not AgentTaskRelation (relationship)
Contains all task data including progress, result, org_id, etc.
- agid, task_id: Belong in AgentTaskRelation (relationship table)
- status, task_type: Cloud schema validation error - rejected by AWS AppSync
⚠️ IMPORTANT: Although appsync_schema.graphql shows 'status' and 'task_type' fields,
the actual cloud API rejects them with 'field not in AgentTask' error.
This indicates the cloud schema was updated but local schema file is outdated.
Schema fields: ataskid, owner, name, description, org_id, schedule, objectives, metadata, start, priority, trigger, progress, result, error_message, settings, created_at, updated_at
